SQLTest.TestStatement: SELECT 'true' FROM DBVersion where history not like '%770.68%';

SQLDocument.SQLStatement: update DBVersion set history = history + ',770.68' where history not like '%770.68%';

Verbal and nonverbal communication needs</text> </line> <line border="none" shaded="true"> <cell border="none" cell-span="4" line-span="1"> <embedded-list detail-context="iep.3744v.detail" extended-dictionary-oid="ddxIl3454V " id="verbalNonverbalFactors" popup-height="600" popup-width="800" relationship="relGfdGfcOid" selection-type="none" show-add-button="false" show-delete-button="false" independent-save="true"> <system-value alias="aut-conf-ch-factors" source="constant" value="Verbal and Nonverbal Communication" /> <field alias="aut-conf-ch-std-needs" sort="true" label="Student Needs" /> <field alias="aut-conf-ch-supports" sort="true" label="Supports Identified" /> <filter alias="aut-conf-ch-factors" connector="and" operator="equals" source="constant" value="Verbal and Nonverbal Communication" /> </embedded-list> </cell> </line>

UPDATE VIEW_TEMPLATE SET VWT_VIEW_DEFINITION = '<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <!-- #TEMPLATE-ID [form.sped-il-3457b/c] #PROCEDURE-ID [SYS-SPED-3457BC] --> <template> <tab> <row> <block> <line align="center" border="bottom" shaded="true"> <text bold="true" font-size="large">PARENT/GUARDIAN CONSENT FOR INITIAL EVALUATION</text> </line> <line border="none" shaded="true"> <property alias="date" label-short="false" /> </line> <line align="left" border="none" shaded="true"> <cell align="left" border="none" cell-span="1" line-span="1"> <text>Dear Parent/Guardian</text> </cell> </line> <line border="none" shaded="true"> <spacer height="1" /> </line> <line align="left" border="none" shaded="true"> <text bold="false" font-size="small">Each school district shall ensure that a full and individual evaluation is conducted for each child being considered for special education and related services. The purpose of an evaluation is to determine:</text> </line> <line border="none" shaded="true"> <spacer height="1" /> </line> <line align="left" border="none" shaded="true"> <spacer width="20" /> <text bold="false" font-size="small">-</text> <spacer width="10" /> <text bold="false" font-size="small">Whether the child has one or more disabilities;</text> </line> <line align="left" border="none" shaded="true"> <spacer width="20" /> <text bold="false" font-size="small">-</text> <spacer width="10" /> <text bold="false" font-size="small">The present levels of academic achievement and functional performance of the child;</text> </line> <line align="left" border="none" shaded="true"> <spacer width="20" /> <text bold="false" font-size="small">-</text> <spacer width="10" /> <text bold="false" font-size="small">Whether the disability is adversely affecting the child''s education; and,</text> </line> <line align="left" border="none" shaded="true"> <spacer width="20" /> <text bold="false" font-size="small">-</text> <spacer width="10" /> <text bold="false" font-size="small">Whether the child needs special education and related services.</text> </line> <line border="none" shaded="true"> <spacer height="1" /> </line> <line align="left" border="none" shaded="true"> <text bold="false" font-size="small">An evaluation considers domains (areas related to the suspected disability) that may be relevant to the educational problems experienced by the individual child under consideration. The nature and intensity of the evaluation, including which domains will be addressed, will vary depending on the needs of your child and the type of existing information already available. The IEP Team, of which you are a member, determines the specific assessments needed to evaluate the individual needs of your child. Within 60 school days from the date of parent/guardian consent, a conference will be scheduled with you to discuss the findings and determine eligibility for special education and related services.</text> </line> <line border="none" shaded="true"> <spacer height="1" /> </line> <line align="left" border="none" shaded="true"> <text bold="false" font-size="small">The IEP team must complete page 2 of this form prior to obtaining parental consent for evaluation. If the IEP team determines no additional evaluation is needed, than parental agreement and not parental consent is required.</text> </line> <line border="none" shaded="true"> <spacer height="1" /> </line> <line align="left" border="none" shaded="true"> <text bold="true" font-size="small">PARENT/GUARDIAN CONSENT FOR INITIAL EVALUATION</text> </line> <line align="left" border="none" shaded="true"> <cell border="none" cell-span="1" line-span="1"> <text bold="false" font-size="small">I understand the school district must have my consent for the initial evaluation. If I refuse consent for an initial evaluation, the school district may, but is not required to, pursue override procedures through due process. If the school district chooses not to pursue such procedures, the school district is not in violation of the required evaluation procedures. I understand my rights as explained to me and contained in the</text> <text bold="true" font-size="small">Explanation of Procedural Safeguards.</text> <text bold="false" font-size="small">I understand the scope of the evaluation as described on page 2 of this form.</text> </cell> </line> <line align="left" border="none" shaded="true"> <radio alias="is-give-consent" value="-1" bold="true" font-size="medium">Not chosen</radio> </line> <line align="left" border="none" shaded="true"> <radio alias="is-give-consent" value="1" bold="true" font-size="medium">I give consent</radio> <radio alias="is-give-consent" value="0" bold="true" font-size="medium">I do not give consent</radio> <text font-size="medium" bold="true"> to collect the evaluation data as described on page 2 of this form.</text> </line> </block> </row> <row> <block> <line align="center" border="none" shaded="true"> <text bold="true" font-size="large">PARENT/GUARDIAN CONSENT FOR EVALUATION</text> </line> <line align="center" border="bottom" shaded="true"> <text bold="true" font-size="large">Identification of Needed Assessments</text> </line> <line border="bottom" shaded="true"> <cell border="none" cell-span="1" line-span="1"> <embedded-list extended-dictionary-oid="DDX000000R602X" id="identificationAssessments" popup-height="400" popup-width="700" relationship="relGfdGfcOid" selection-type="none" detail-context="iep.identification.assessments.detail" show-add-button="false" show-delete-button="false" warn-on-delete="true" independent-save="true"> <field alias="domain-types" /> <field alias="is-relevant" label="RELEVANT" /> <field alias="exist-inf" label="ABOUT THE CHILD" /> <field alias="add-evdata" label="ADDITIONAL EVALUATION" /> <field alias="source" label="SOURCES" /> </embedded-list> </cell> </line> </block> </row> </tab> </template>', VWT_PROCEDURE_ID = NULL WHERE VWT_OID = 'vwtX2IL3457bc' AND (VWT_CUSTOM_IND <> '1' or VWT_CUSTOM_IND is null);

UPDATE VIEW_TEMPLATE SET VWT_VIEW_DEFINITION = '<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <!-- #TEMPLATE-ID [form.sped-il-3457c] --> <template> <tab name="Parent Consent (34-57C)"> <row> <block> <line align="center" border="none" shaded="true"> <text bold="true" font-size="large">PARENT/GUARDIAN CONSENT FOR REEVALUATION</text> </line> <line align="left" shaded="true"> <property alias="pgcre-date" label="Date" /> </line> <line shaded="true"> <spacer /> </line> <line align="left" border="none" shaded="true"> <cell align="left" border="none" cell-span="1" line-span="1"> <text font-size="medium" bold="true">Dear Parent/Guardian</text> </cell> </line> <line align="left" border="none" shaded="true"> <text font-size="medium">Each school district shall ensure that a reevaluation is conducted for each child being reconsidered for special education and related services. A reevaluation must occur at least once every three years unless the parent and school district agree that a reevaluation is not needed. A reevaluation may not occur more than once a year, unless the parent and school district agree it is necessary. The purpose of a reevaluation is to determine:</text> </line> <line shaded="true"> <spacer /> </line> <line align="left" border="none" shaded="true"> <text bold="false" font-size="medium">- Whether the child continues to have one or more disabilities;</text> </line> <line align="left" border="none" shaded="true"> <text bold="false" font-size="medium">- The present levels of academic achievement and functional performance of the child;</text> </line> <line align="left" border="none" shaded="true"> <text bold="false" font-size="medium">- Whether the disability is adversely affecting the child''s education</text> </line> <line align="left" border="none" shaded="true"> <text bold="false" font-size="medium">- Whether the child continues to need special education and related services; and</text> </line> <line align="left" border="none" shaded="true"> <text bold="false" font-size="medium">- Whether any additions or modifications to the child''s special education and related services are needed</text> </line> <line align="left" border="none" shaded="true"> <text bold="false" font-size="medium">to enable the child to meet the measurable annual goals in the Individualized Education Program (IEP)</text> </line> <line align="left" border="none" shaded="true"> <text bold="false" font-size="medium">and to participate appropriately in the general curriculum, extracurricular activities and other nonacademic</text> </line> <line align="left" border="none" shaded="true"> <text bold="false" font-size="medium">activities.</text> </line> <line align="left" border="none" shaded="true"> <text font-size="medium">An evaluation considers domains (areas related to the suspected disability) that may be relevant to the educational problems experienced by the individual child under consideration. The nature and intensity of the evaluation, including which domains will be addressed, will vary depending on the needs of your child and the type of existing information already available. The IEP Team, of which you are a member, determines the specific assessments needed to evaluate the individual needs of your child. Upon completion of your child''s evaluation, a conference will be scheduled with you to discuss the findings and determine eligibility for special education and related services.</text> </line> <line align="left" border="none" shaded="true"> <cell> <spacer hight="5" /> </cell> </line> <line align="left" border="none" shaded="true"> <text font-size="medium">The IEP team must complete page 2 of this form prior to obtaining parental consent for reevaluation. If the IEP team determines no additional evaluation is needed, then parental agreement and not parental consent is required.</text> </line> <line align="left" border="bottom" shaded="true"> <spacer height="25" /> </line> <line align="left" border="none" shaded="true"> <text font-size="medium" bold="true">PARENT/GUARDIAN AGREEMENT THAT NO ADDITIONAL DATA IS NEEDED</text> </line> <line align="left" border="none" shaded="true"> <spacer height="10" /> </line> <line align="left" border="none" shaded="true"> <text font-size="medium">I understand the school district is not required to conduct a reevaluation to determine if my child continues to be a child with a disability. However, I may request the school district to conduct the reevaluation.</text> </line> <line align="left" border="none" shaded="true"> <radio alias="pgcre-agree" value="-1" bold="true" font-size="medium">Not chosen</radio> </line> <line align="left" border="none" shaded="true"> <radio alias="pgcre-agree" value="1" bold="true" font-size="medium">I agree</radio> <radio alias="pgcre-agree" value="0" bold="true" font-size="medium">I do not agree</radio> <text font-size="medium" bold="true"> with the determination that no additional data is needed</text> </line> <line align="left" border="bottom" shaded="true"> <spacer height="25" /> </line> <line align="left" border="none" shaded="true"> <text font-size="medium" bold="true">PARENT/GUARDIAN CONSENT TO COLLECT ADDITIONAL EVALUATION DATA</text> </line> <line align="left" border="none" shaded="true"> <spacer height="10" /> </line> <line align="left" border="none" shaded="true"> <text font-size="medium">I understand the school district must have my consent for the reevaluation. If I refuse consent, the school district may, but is not required to, pursue override procedures through due process. If the school district chooses not pursue such procedures, the school district is not in violation of the required evaluation procedure. Furthermore, I understand that if I fail to respond to the request for consent, the school district may pursue the reevaluation if the school district made reasonable efforts to obtain such consent. I understand my rights as explained to me and contained in the Explanation of Procedural Safeguards. I understand the scope of the evaluation as described on page 2 of this form.</text> </line> <line align="left" border="none" shaded="true"> <radio alias="pgcre-give-consent" value="-1" bold="true" font-size="medium">Not chosen</radio> </line> <line align="left" border="none" shaded="true"> <radio alias="pgcre-give-consent" value="1" bold="true" font-size="medium">I give consent</radio> <radio alias="pgcre-give-consent" value="0" bold="true" font-size="medium">I do not give consent</radio> <text font-size="medium" bold="true"> to collect the evaluation data as described on page 2 of this form.</text> </line> <line align="left" border="bottom" shaded="true"> <spacer height="10" /> </line> <line align="left" border="none" shaded="true"> <property alias="pgcre-signed-date" label="Signed date" /> </line> </block> </row> <row> <block> <line align="center" border="none" shaded="true"> <text bold="true" font-size="large">PARENT/GUARDIAN CONSENT FOR EVALUATION</text> </line> <line align="center" border="bottom" shaded="true"> <text bold="true" font-size="large">Identification of Needed Assessments</text> </line> <line border="bottom" shaded="true"> <cell border="none" cell-span="1" line-span="1"> <embedded-list extended-dictionary-oid="ddxIl3457C" id="identificationAssessments" popup-height="400" popup-width="700" relationship="relGfdGfcOid" selection-type="none" detail-context="iep.identification.assessments.detail" show-add-button="false" show-delete-button="false" warn-on-delete="true" independent-save="true"> <field alias="domain-types" /> <field alias="is-relevant" label="RELEVANT" /> <field alias="exist-inf" label="ABOUT THE CHILD" /> <field alias="add-evdata" label="ADDITIONAL EVALUATION" /> <field alias="source" label="SOURCES" /> </embedded-list> </cell> </line> </block> </row> </tab> </template>', VWT_PROCEDURE_ID = NULL WHERE VWT_OID = 'vwtX2IL3457c' AND (VWT_CUSTOM_IND <> '1' or VWT_CUSTOM_IND is null);
